```{r setup, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
require("knitr")
library(tidyverse)
library(jsonlite)
```

## Loading data

Load the dataset from Sciencedata.dk
```{r}
EDH <- jsonlite::fromJSON("https://sciencedata.dk/public/1f5f56d09903fe259c0906add8b3a55e/EDH_text_cleaned_2021-01-21.json")
```
Or load local dataset if you have it
```{r}
EDH <- jsonlite::fromJSON("../data/EDH_text_cleaned_2021-01-21.json")
```
You can also load the dataset directly from Zenodo

```{r}
EDH <- jsonlite::fromJSON("https://zenodo.org/record/4888168/files/EDH_text_cleaned_2021-01-21.json?download=1")
```

# Dataset exploration
```{r}
names(EDH)
```
